title: Health bar is grey
body: When I'm in game, all the champions have grey health bars. Is there a way to fix this? It happened in 2 patches ago, then when i updated the client with the next patch it resolved. however, the recent patch made the health bars go grey again.

replies.body:
Try updating your graphics drivers.

If that doesn't help, try toggling v-sync in game settings (if it's on turn it off, and visa versa).

If that still doesn't help, try running a client repair.

If none of them work get back tome and I'll see what else I can find.
